short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for seamlessly skipping spoilers in html5 videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension for blocking spoilers in html videos. 

We've all had that friend who was just an absolute spoilerphobe, and we could never share anything with them. This extension fixes that problem. Using the extension to mark spoilers in a video, you can generate a custom URL which will play the video with spoilers blocked out as they occur. Ensure whoever you send the URL to also has this extension installed, and then they can watch, worry free of spoilers.
